title: DBC Natural Holistic Health Center
description: A holistic approach lets you see the big picture to a healthier happier you.
cleaned_text: Functional medicine differs from the traditional medical model by scientifically looking at the root of symptoms. Find out about the unique practitioners at our office, and why you'll be in such very good hands here. [Watch our video!](#IntroVideo) This is a place to get healthy, healthier or healthiest! Learn more about our functional medicine services. We need to learn some things about you before we can schedule your initial exam. Click here to get started.
